thread.title: This Girl Is Setting Major Weekend Goals For Kriti Sanon And How!
thread.title_full: This Girl Is Setting Major Weekend Goals For Kriti Sanon And How!

author: Richa Lall
title: This Girl Is Setting Major Weekend Goals For Kriti Sanon And How!
text:
IN Celebrities ON 25 Feb, 2017 This Girl Is Setting Major Weekend Goals For Kriti Sanon And How! Share on twitter Follow Us On 
The weekend's here, and it's time to let loose to get yourself some much deserved pampering. Everybody has their own definition of a 'weekend chill' and half of us belong to night crawler's category. But we're not the only ones who plead guilty. This chick is having one hell of a time in Spain and is setting major weekend goals for us, making everyone green-eyed. 
Why? Because... This Girl Is Setting Major Weekend Goals For Kriti Sanon And How! 754 396 Oh well, you need to see it with your own eyes to answer that one. Loading... 
Now didn't that make you a little envious and made your eyes gleam with a lot of wanderlust at the same time? Also, she even mentioned Kriti Sanon in the caption. WHY? 
To our surprise, Kriti re-posted the video! She even reverted to her with this... 
Okay. Now we're curious to know about this new kid in town! This followed by Karan Kundra re-posting the same video! What's even happening? 
This girl is keeping us on the edge of our seats, and the curiosity is killing us! You see how everyone is going gaga over Cemora?! (Well that's what Kriti Sanon called her) 
Well, right now all we know about her is her Instagram handle @One_miss_wander where she uploads beautiful pictures from around the world because apparently she's a traveller (that's what we've figured out) and she's doing her job right! 
We're following this new mystery woman who's setting all sort of goals for each one of us! 
Are you?
